tnt的翻译
3.1 mining
Mining using TNT might be faster than mining by hand but it is impractical for gathering resources; about 70% of the blocks are completely destroyed in the process. In addition, TNT is not very effective when used to mine cobblestone and ores and is only time efficient when mining blocks with a low damage resistance, such as dirt or sand. The items needed to make TNT are quite valuable and may be a waste of resources if nothing is gained out of it. Nevertheless, TNT can be a part of efficient mining techniques - as the means of removing unneeded layers of blocks and exposing underlying layers. It can also be used for clearing large volumes for underground building projects.
3.1 矿物收集
用tnt采矿可能会比用镐更快，但是用来收集物品是不切实际的。大约70%的方块会在tnt爆炸时被完全毁坏。此外，tnt用来收集类似泥土，沙子此类低防暴力的物品会比用来收集原石或其他矿石有效率的多。tnt的制造材料相对而言是比较珍贵的，如果没有成果的话那将是一种浪费。但是，tnt是可以成为有效率收集矿物秘诀的一部分——用来去除掉不需要的地层或者用来让相关的地层显露。tnt也可以用于清理大型地下建筑物。

今天写3.1.1
Water as blast controllerIf a layer of water is spread between a destructible block and an explosion, the block will be protected. A one-block-thick water screen will stop most explosions from reaching the other side, however, a player laying multiple blocks of TNT should mind the placement of the explosives, as primed TNT entities may launch each other through the water screen. Using water this way lets you use TNT near an important area, such as a house, base, or ore vein.Thus, a player can use this to dig a big quarry or hole precisely and quickly by placing a "curtain" of water on the extremities of said hole and dynamiting the center.A player could also make a TNT trap that drops TNT into a block of water, preserving the blocks around it but damaging, if not killing, the mob that activated it.You could make a timed TNT fuse by placing redstone repeaters in a straight line and then you can select the delays. then when you turn it on you will have enough time to run from the TNT but this is advised for people that have placed a very large amount of TNT (because the blast range and damage could kill you)
3.1.1 水流控制爆炸力度
如果在爆炸范围和破坏范围内的方块中间有一层水，那么这些方块将不会卷入爆炸。1层高的水将阻挡大部分的爆炸，但是，如果玩家放置了多个tnt应该注意放置位置，因为由于tnt的爆炸会将其他的tnt炸飞以导致这些被炸飞的tnt穿透这层水。使用这个方法可以让你在比较重要的地方使用tnt而不必担心后果，类似于建筑物，玩家居住地，以及矿脉。
玩家可以用在四周放置一定量的水去引爆tnt，从而快速的去制作一个准确的洞或采石场
玩家还可以使用水来制作tnt陷阱，当生物触发附近的机关时，tnt掉入水中会对生物造成伤害或者死亡，但是不会破坏周围的方块。
玩家也可以用一列设置好延迟的红石中继器来制作定时引爆的tnt。这样的话玩家将有足够的时间逃离tnt的爆炸范围，但是这个只是建议放置了大量的tnt的玩家（因为爆炸范围以及伤害足够导致你死亡）

replies.txt_content: 谷歌翻译前来助阵：采矿使用TNT炸药可能比手工开采快，但它是不切实际收集资源;约70％的块的过程中完全摧毁。此外，TNT是不是很有效时用来挖掘的鹅卵石，矿石，是只有时间效率低损伤性开采荒料，如灰尘或沙子。需要TNT炸药的项目是很宝贵的，如果没有得到它可能是一种资源的浪费。不过，TNT可以高效开采技术的一部分 - 为消除不必要的层块和揭露基础层的一种手段。它也可以用于清除大量的地下建设项目
